headers.subject: [tosdr:2022] Microsoft.com [?] You are not allowed to reproduce Microsoft services you use

html:
Not sure if this is important; a broad definition would say if you used a Microsoft word processor and you make a word processor you broke this ToS.  Thoughts?

Unless otherwise specified, the Services are for your personal and non-commercial use. You may not modify, copy, distribute, transmit, display, perform, reproduce, publish, license, create derivative works from, transfer, or sell any information, software, products or services obtained from the Services.

 

From <http://www.microsoft.com/en-us/legal/intellectualproperty/copyright/default.aspx> 

--
tosdr.org | twitter.com/tosdr | github.com/tosdr

text:
Not sure if this is important; a broad definition would say if you used a 
Microsoft word processor and you make a word processor you broke this ToS.
